abstract: Wall Street has long seen sense in Walt Disney selling or spinning off ABC, the low-rated TV network and the one piece that does not seem to fit well with the entire entertainment empire, the problem is finding a buyer, Reuters reported.
snippet: Wall Street has long seen sense in Walt Disney selling or spinning off ABC, the low-rated TV network and the one piece that does not seem to fit well with the entire entertainment empire, the problem is finding a buyer, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street has long seen sense in Walt Disney selling or spinning off ABC, the low-rated TV network and the one piece that does not seem to fit well with the entertainment empire — but the problem is finding a buyer, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Wall Street Debates Fate of ABC

abstract: Heading into the Memorial Day weekend, the prospects in North America for the Walt Disney Company’s “Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time” appear grim.
snippet: Heading into the Memorial Day weekend, the prospects in North America for the Walt Disney Company’s “Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time” appear grim.
lead_paragraph: Disney’s “Prince” is starting to look like a pauper.

headline.main: Bad Box Office Omens for ‘Prince of Persia’
